bot.name: Agora
global.error.insufficient_perms:
**You are missing the permissions to complete this action.**

_If you believe this is a mistake, please contact server staff!_
perms.feature_embed.desc: Allows users to use the /embed command
feature.perms.command.list.desc: View a list of all permissions
feature.perms.command.list.embed.title: List of available permissions:
feature.perms.command.set.desc: Set what permissions a certain role should have
feature.perms.command.set.role.desc: The role to set the permissions for
feature.perms.command.set.perm.desc: Grant/Deny the permission '$0' to the role
feature.perms.command.set.failure: It seems like no permissions were passed!
feature.perms.command.show.desc: List all permissions of a specific role
feature.perms.command.show.role.desc: The role to list the permissions of
feature.perms.command.show.embed.title: Permissions of $0
feature.perms.command.show.embed.desc: The role $0 has the following permissions:
feature.lang.command.desc: Set the guild-preferred language for this bot
feature.lang.command.list.desc: View a list of all available languages
feature.lang.command.list.embed.title: List of available languages:
feature.lang.command.set.failure: It seems like no language was passed!
feature.embed.command.desc: Allows users to create custom embeds
feature.embed.command.description: Set the description of the embed
feature.embed.command.title: Set the title of the embed
feature.embed.command.title_url: Set the url of the title
feature.embed.command.author: Set the author of the embed
feature.embed.command.author_url: Set the url of the author
feature.embed.command.author_icon: Set the icon of the author
feature.embed.command.footer: Set the footer of the embed
feature.embed.command.footer_icon: Set the footer icon of the embed
feature.embed.command.image: Set the image of the embed
feature.embed.command.thumbnail: Set the thumbnail of the embed
feature.embed.command.url: Set the url of the embed
feature.embed.command.fields: Add custom fields to the embed - Format: <inline (y/n)>##<title>##<content>; ...
feature.embed.command.color: Set the color of the embed - Format: #RRGGBB
feature.embed.command.timestamp: If set to true, a timestamp will be added
feature.embed.command.links: Add link buttons to the embed - Format: <label>##<link>; ...
feature.embed.command.error.empty: You need to pass __at least__ **one** argument!
feature.embed.command.success: Your embed has been pasted successfully!
